localInspection.displayName: Trying to call a non-callable object
Assigning function call that doesn't return anything
Global variable is undefined at the module level
Access to a protected member of a class
Class must implement all abstract methods
Assignment to 'for' loop or 'with' statement parameter
Missing type hinting for function definition

action.description: Step into, ignore stepping filters for libraries, constructors, etc.
Allows to quickly run Python console
Executes selected code fragment in Python/Django console
Create a new directory and __init__.py inside it
Delete compiled bytecode files in selected directory and its subdirectories
Create package with the same name and move content of the module to its __init__.py
Create module with the same name and move content of __init__.py to that module
Step to the next line executed ignoring libraries
